thread.title: ISIS says it executed Tunisian in Libya for spying
thread.title_full: ISIS says it executed Tunisian in Libya for spying | News24

author: news24.com
title: ISIS says it executed Tunisian in Libya for spying
text:
Tripoli - The Libyan branch of the Islamic State group has released a video purportedly showing the execution of a Tunisian for spying on behalf of Libya's internationally recognised government.
The footage, released late on Monday, showed the man in an orange jumpsuit and blindfolded, kneeling in front of a group of armed men in the eastern city of Benghazi.
As one of the men finishes reading out the sentence to "death for espionage", another one shoots him in the head several times to shouts of Allahu akbar (God is greatest).
The man was said to be a 39-year-old baker living in Benghazi, cradle of the 2011 revolution that ousted dictator Muammar Gaddafi and plunged the country into chaos that continues to the present.
